page.title: 18MABE CHURCH NEAR TREVERVA
page.content: The church of the neighbouring village of Mabe lies within this area.The Parish of Mabe lies immediately inland behind the towns of Falmouth and Penryn. It extends westwards as far as Edgcumbe and includes the villages of Longdowns and Rame. On the south side it encompasses the places of Lamanva and Treverva.It extends Northwards to include the village of Ponsanooth.The normal Sunday services at the Parish Church consist of a Sung Eucharist at 10.00am,Sunday School at 11.15am and Evensong at 6.00pm.On the first Sunday of the month there is also a service of Holy Communion at 8.30am.St. Michael's Church in Ponsanooth has a service of Holy Communion every Sunday morning at 11.15am.It is an isolated Church-the size of congregation can depend heavily on weather conditions. Average congregation is 30 people.
